data.text: Eyi ne asɛm a odiyifo Habakuk nya fii Awurade nkyɛn wɔ anisoadehu mu.
Awurade, enkosi da bɛn na memfrɛ nsrɛ mmoa,
Wɔn ho yɛ hu na nnipa suro wɔn;
Wɔn apɔnkɔ ho yɛ hare sen asebɔ,
Wɔn nyinaa ba sɛ wɔrebɛyɛ basabasayɛ.
Wɔbɔ hoo te sɛ mframa kɔ wɔn anim.
Awurade, wunni hɔ fi tete ana?
Wʼaniwa yɛ kronkron a wuntumi nhwɛ nnebɔne;
Woama nnipa ayɛ sɛ nsumnam a ɛwɔ po mu,
Ɔtamfo tirimɔdenfo no de darewa yi wɔn,
Ne saa nti ɔbɔ afɔre ma nʼasau
Enti ɔnkɔ so nni nʼasau mu nam,
